about.title: About
about.description: Hey there! My name is Lautaro Nasello, and I'm a web developer. I'm 23 years old, and I lived in Córdoba, Argentina. Apart from coding, I'm a student of Psychology in UNC, play guitar in my free times and also I keep learning new technologies because I love create new things. I always want to know new ways to simplify what i do.
